title: A Famous Building Gets a New Name
summary: The Kennedy Center, a big performing arts building in Washington DC, is getting a new name. The White House says the board voted to call it the Trump-Kennedy Center. They did this because President Trump helped save the building with money and repairs. Trump was surprised and happy about it. But not everyone agrees. Some people on the board say the vote was not fair because they were muted and could not speak against it. Kennedy's family is upset because the building is a memorial to President John F. Kennedy. The change might cause arguments because many people love the old name.

background_read: The Kennedy Center is a big building in Washington DC where people go to see plays, concerts, and other shows. It was named after President John F. Kennedy, who was a leader in the 1960s and is remembered for his work. Boards are groups that make decisions for places like this. Sometimes, when things change, people have different opinions, which can lead to arguments.
